name: Shinobi Frog-san
description:
Shinobi Frog-san is my first game I ever made. It is a 2D Platformer game that focuses on reaching the goal. The game has 10 levels and has a good side task of collecting apples. Each level has 3 apples that you can collect and it will be stored in the menu, somewhat like an achievement. The theme of the level changes every 3 levels so there is quite a lot of variety. Last few levels may be "a bit"  hard.

Credits: The game uses assets from Unity Asset Store such as Pixel frog and Cainos. The music in the game is entirely made by the developer, Michael Chen AKA SerpentSea.

Good luck and have fun!
